Discussions.Discussion_Name: Deane Simpson, Charlotte Malterre-Barthes and Jesse LeCavalier on “The Agency of Drawing"

Messages.Author: Jörg Stollmann
Messages.Content: Dear all, my friends and former colleagues Deane, Charlotte, and Jesse will be talking about their new book in in our SFB/CRC lecture series "Spacetime Matters". They have published amazing research on urban transformation, infrastructure, communities, and logistics employing mapping and drawing as a research tool. I am sure the lecture will also give you imputs for the studio and your work in general. 06.5.2024 / 5pm / 1. The Agency of Drawing Deane Simpson (The Royal Danish Academy of Fine Arts School of Architecture, Copenhagen), Charlotte Malterre-Barthes (Swiss Federal Institute of Technology, Lausanne) and Jesse LeCavalier (Cornell University College of Architecture, Art, and Planning, Ithaca) For regustration / Zoom link: https://sfb1265.de/en/events/spacetime-matters-2/
